  Claim

   Someone you don’t know sends you a check, and then asks you to deposit it
   and send some of the money to another party.

In a fake check scam, a person you don’t know asks you to
     deposit a check – sometimes for several thousand dollars and usually for
     more than what you are owed – and wire some of the money back to that
     person.

The best way to avoid falling victim to such scams is not to cash or
   deposit checks for people you do not know, not to wire money to people you
   do not know, and not to spend funds from large checks you have deposited
   until you have verified with your bank that those checks have fully
   cleared.
